channel.title: Freddy1990.com
channel.description: Well, as most of you don't know, I'm building my webpage at freddy1990.com as the new home of SCAR (and my other programs). However, I'm still deciding on which type of board I'm going to use and I'd like some opinions, currently I'm setting up a phpbb but I can always change... So vote away!

Get smf, then as soon as the ads have payed for Vbulletin and a skin, purchase the skin.

Read full topic

item.title: Freddy1990.com
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

I think you should use SMF or Vbulletin.

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:12, topic:64733”][quote author=.Fusion (usernamelol) link=topic=93915.msg980551#msg980551 date=1173244335]

If you screw up a vBulletin crack/license share there’s apparently some way they can tell, happened to Kaitnieks if I recall correctly.

No wasn’t that his satellite skin?
[/quote]
Satellite is just a skin in vBulletin, there are plenty.

In my opinion, vBulletin would be best… I loved it at Kaitnieks, and love it at SRL. Satellite theme is my favourite. Yes, they found out Kaitnieks had a cracked version, but it was a long time into the forums existence. Maybe one of the vBulletin employees viewed the page and could somehow tell it was cracked…?

P.S. I say we give Freddy the Web Design cup. :rolleyes:[/quote]

The template was modified by him, not created by him.

Read full topic

item.title: Freddy1990.com
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:2, topic:64733”]Hi Freddy!

In my opinion I hate phpbb for the looks and the way they designed it, where everything goes in general. In my opinion I would use SMF or vBulliten, I know you probably don’t want to buy it but its a suggestion. The website looks awesome and so does the template. I would suggest adding more stuff to it, i’m sure you will once you get further along right? SMF has better security then phpbb. I have heard several phpbb boards get hacked each day but hopefully you won’t get any hackers. SMF also changing themes and adding modifications are easier in my opinion. All you got to do is upload it and it changes everything for you. Unless you are using one that changes the default skin which then you have to manually edit. SMF is also easier and has way more features in my opinion. Now vBul has more features than smf but still you have to manually do themes, modifications, and everything else like phpbb. Look froward to your site.[/quote]
Lol, I hate phpbb as well

93dcthugs93:

vBulletin. I’ll let you use my license and such. Lol.

Heh, thx, but no thx, I prefer to wait until I buy a licence myself…
Well, I’m gonna get ads soon and hopefully they’ll pay for the licence…

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:64733”]SMF is the best.

I like the homepage though, it looks good.

(small typo on http://freddy1990.com/scar.html therefore)[/quote]
Thx

Read full topic

item.title: Freddy1990.com
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Hi Freddy!

In my opinion I hate phpbb for the looks and the way they designed it, where everything goes in general. In my opinion I would use SMF or vBulliten, I know you probably don’t want to buy it but its a suggestion. The website looks awesome and so does the template. I would suggest adding more stuff to it, i’m sure you will once you get further along right? SMF has better security then phpbb. I have heard several phpbb boards get hacked each day but hopefully you won’t get any hackers. SMF also changing themes and adding modifications are easier in my opinion. All you got to do is upload it and it changes everything for you. Unless you are using one that changes the default skin which then you have to manually edit. SMF is also easier and has way more features in my opinion. Now vBul has more features than smf but still you have to manually do themes, modifications, and everything else like phpbb. Look froward to your site.

Read full topic
